item.title: Sundome!! Milky Way
item.description: Sundome!! Milky Way (Japanese: すんどめ!! ミルキーウェイ, Hepburn: Sundome!! Mirukīu Ei) is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Kazuki Funatsu. It was serialized in Shueisha's seinen manga magazine Grand Jump from June 2016 to November 2019, with its chapters collected in nine tankōbon volumes. An alternate ending, titled Sundome!! Milky Way Another End was serialized in the same magazine from February to December 2020. In North America, the series is licensed for English release by Seven Seas Entertainment.
